name: Youtube Playlist
description: Fetch content from all videos in youtube playlist. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
import re

from langchain_community.document_loaders.web_base import WebBaseLoader

from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import MessageTextInput, Output
from axiestudio.schema import Data
import scrapetube
from langchain_community.document_loaders import YoutubeLoader


class URLComponent(Component):
    display_name = "Playlist Youtube URL"
    description = "Fetch content from all videos in youtube playlist."
    icon = "layout-template"
    name = "URL"

    inputs = [
        
        MessageTextInput(
            name="playlist_id",
            display_name="Playlist ID",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Data", name="data", method="fetch_content"),
    ]

    def transcript(self, link, language='pt'):
        loader = YoutubeLoader.from_youtube_url(
            link,
            add_video_info=True,
            language=[language],
            translation="pt",
        )
        return loader
        
    def fetch_content(self) -> list[Data]:
        videos = scrapetube.get_playlist(self.playlist_id)
        video_urls = [f'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v={video["videoId"]}' for video in videos]
        data = []
        
        for url in video_urls:
            loader = self.transcript(link=url)
            doc = loader.load()
            data.append(Data(text=doc[0].page_content, **doc[0].metadata))
        self.status = data
        return data
code.name: code

node.description: Fetch content from all videos in youtube playlist.

    outputs = [

    def transcript(self, link, language='pt'):
